name: Yokai Tactics
description:
Yokai Tactics is a tactical game made in two months for our year-end project.

Inspired from tactical games like Into the Breach and Dofus, as well as Okami, Yokai Tactics takes place in a traditional japanese universe where a group of hunters fight different yokais.

Credits: 
Pandorage - Developer, level designer
Mad - Character Designer (Playable Characters), 2D Artist
May LV - 3D artist, sound designer, level designer
IdealisCult - Character Designer (Bosses), 2D Artist
Shinji - Game Designer, UI Artist, 2D Artist
Valentin M. - Developper, Game Designer
